G

GestureDeviceManager - Class in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures
The GestureDeviceManager is responsible for communicating with the gesture device as well as providing listeners with event notifications when gesture events have occured.
GestureDeviceManager(Activity) - Constructor for class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager
Creates a new GestureDeviceManager instance.
GestureDeviceManager(Activity, GestureMode) - Constructor for class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager
Instantiates a new gesture device manager.
GestureDeviceManager.CameraSource - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures
The Enum CameraSource.
GestureDeviceManager.GestureResultCallback - Interface in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures
 
GestureDeviceManager.OpenAndStartGestureDeviceTask - Class in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures
The Class OpenAndStartGestureDeviceTask.
GestureDeviceManager.OpenAndStartGestureDeviceTask() - Constructor for class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager.OpenAndStartGestureDeviceTask
 
GestureMode - Enum in com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures
The GestureMode is a configuration value for the Gesture Device.
getCameraSource(int) - Static method in enum com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager.CameraSource
Converts a gesture device id to camera source id.
getCameraSource() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager
Returns the current camera source id.
getFlags() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.OverlayPreferences
Return the bitmask of the visual indicators show settings.
getGestureMode() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager
Returns the device's current mode.
getGestureMode(int) - Static method in enum com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureMode
Converts an int value into a GestureMode if available.
getOverlayPreferences() - Method in class com.qualcomm.snapdragon.sdk.gestures.GestureDeviceManager
Gets the overlay preferences.
